title: Redirect Rewarded RP?
body: So last week I participated in a Microsoft tournament, and in this next week I am supposed to receive 15000 rp. But in the time between the tournament and now, my account was permanently banned (skipped the mute punishments.) Is there any way I can get the incoming RP to get directed to another account?

replies.body: Since the RP was supposed to go to that specific account, I don't really think they'd be able to redirect the prize to someone else or a different account. To be certain though, I'd shoot our game team a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if this might be possible whatsoever, but I can't make any promises.
